Once you find a training you want to attend, simply click anywhere within its frame to open the training page and click the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Include me\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" button.
